title: Breeding Your Own Meat Birds, Hatcheries & Avian Flu with Tom McMurray
itunes:title: Breeding Your Own Meat Birds, Hatcheries & Avian Flu with Tom McMurray
description: If you're looking to raise meat chickens, the next natural step for us modern-day Pioneers is to consider breeding chickens for a sustainable flock. Join me for this podcast with Tom McMurray from Murray McMurray Hatchery to learn what it takes to successfully breed chickens, as well as tips and tricks if you're considering this option, and how the Avian Flu might effect you. For all of the show notes and links, visit https://melissaknorris.com/347.
